name: Too Much Slime (VCP)
description:
Top down shooter for Weekly game jam 120

-Theme : What a mess

Mutated sludge from the sewer system has started to ooze out of the sewers and is coming for those up-above.

The clean-up crew has arrived (  i.e  just one guy cus.........this game only supports single player right now.......) and is ready to clean up the mess caused by these slimy monstrosities.

Our sole hero then enters the root chamber in which these slime creatures have been emerging from, and must use all the might he can muster to clean up this slimy mess.........once and for all

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move

Left-mouse button to shoot
